config.neo4j.cypher.topic.adults: MERGE (t:Adults {nationalid: event.nationalid}) ON CREATE SET t += {nationalid: event.nationalid, _id: event._id, name: event.name, surname: event.surname, gender: event.gender, dob: event.dob, marital_status: event.marital_status, partner: event.partner, status: event.status, parcel_id: event.address.parcel_id}
